text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm going to
show you how to make linguine with pesto
now I have done a recipe on pesto alone
just the sauce so you can kind of know
how to make it by itself but I've had so
many people requests to show how to
actually make linguine with pesto so I
figured if you guys really want to know
that much I'm going to show you how to
do it so let's go over the ingredients
to get started you're going to need some
linguine pasta of course some fresh
basil some toasted pine nuts garlic
lemon some parmigiano-reggiano extra
virgin olive oil salt and pepper now
again I've done the recipe on just a
sauce alone so if you don't care about
it show how to make with the linguine
you just worried about how to make the
sauce go ahead and check that video out
but for now we're going to get right
into it the first thing you want to do
is get a big pot fill it with water and
put in a good amount of salt and now I'm
just going to take my pasta to the
boiling water and get it cooking
now while the pastas cooking we're going
to get on to making the sauce now I just
put some basil into my food processor I
just think it's easier to make this way
but if you want to try this in a blender
go ahead and try it might be a little
bit more tricky to do but I'm sure you
can get it done now to that I'm going to
add in some pine nuts now what I've done
is I've just very briefly toasted them
in a dry skillet over medium-high heat
just to kind of bring out its flavor or
their flavor I should say remember
they've been sitting in the Packer for a
while so you want to kind of bring them
back to life any time you're working
with nuts that's just what I do makes
them taste ten times better do that I'm
going to add in some garlic two small
cloves or one large clove that I've have
and now I'm going to add in some salt
and pepper just kind of to taste salt
and peppers always to taste and then to
this I'm going to add some lemon juice
and lemon zest now I know I'm not a lot
of people like to put lemon juice and
lemon zest in their pesto I think it
adds a great sort of fresh brightness to
it but if you don't want it don't add it
it's completely up to you just squeeze
some of it right in I just squeeze it on
my fingers just to catch all the little
seeds
that's good now what I'm going to do is
I'm going to pulse this just to kind of
break it up not all the way just to kind
of give it a head start before we add in
the olive oil that what you're looking
for it's nice and coarse now time to
make it a sauce if I can get it back on
and now while this is running you're
going to drizzle in some good quality
extra virgin olive oil you're looking
for about a half a cup or until you get
a nice sauce like thick saucy
consistency that's enough for me
now what I'm going to do is just put
this in a little Bowl or that's so
little because you kind of need to mix
something else in all out now to that
I'm going to grade in a good amount of
parmesan and Reggiano you always want to
add it in after you've kind of made the
sauce so you don't something really
funky happens to the cheese when it's
overly processed especially by the blade
of the food processor and I just like to
do with this wipe personally but you can
do whatever you want give this a nice
stir and I'm also drained my pasta and
I've reserved about 1/2 a cup of the
starchy cooking water that's going to
help you kind of allow the sauce to
adhere to your pasta so now it's just a
question of mixing everything together
put your sauce right in and I did not by
any means rinse off the pasta I want it
to be warm I wanted to kind of wake up
that sauce now just mix everything
together I like to grate in some extra
cheese like that and I always like an
extra helping of freshly grated black
pepper I don't know why my mother does
it so I do it it's kind of like I feel
like I'm being a good child when I do
that that's really about it
smells delicious really delicious and
just something so simple
can be so yummy put that right into a
big bowl I'm going to stop for now
because I just want to give it a taste
it smells so good
you wouldn't believe it I don't want to
make mess mmm that is delicious
took mess and ten minutes to make it
comes perfect every single time
can be easier to do very few ingredients
go to www.hsn
then get in your kitchen and make this

time bye bye
